vote.text: Amendment SA 1092 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 76.

action.text: Amendment SA 1092 proposed by Senator Portman to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1231-1233; text: CR S1231-1232) To reduce unemployment compensation provisions.
